feature.label: Dynatrace Application Monitoring for Eclipse
feature.description: Compatible with Dynatrace AppMon versions starting from 6.1. Conveniently look up source code from within Dynatrace Application Monitoring and launch applications and tests with Dynatrace instrumentation.

update.label: Dynatrace Application Monitoring integration for Eclipse Update Site
